headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Falls More Steeply Than Broader Market: What Investors Need to Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Marathon Petroleum (MPC) stood at $191.54, denoting a -1.02% move from the preceding trading day.
